packagegui.title: Services: RIP

field.description: Enables the Routing Information Protocol daemon.
Select the interfaces that RIP will bind to. You can use the CTRL or COMMAND key to select multiple interfaces.

field.typehint: Select which RIP version the daemon will listen/advertise using.

field.description: Specify a RIPv2 password. This password will be sent in the clear on all RIPv2 responses received and sent.
Turns off aggregation of subnets in RIPv1 and RIPv2 responses.
Turns off aggregation of networks into supernets in RIPv2 responses.
